dongGoi: Hộp 2 vỉ x 7 viên; hộp 4 vỉ x 7 viên
taDuoc: Nhân: Lactose monohydrate, Microcrystalline cellulose, Colloidal silicon dioxide, Magnesium stearate; Viên 1mg: Hypromellose 6cP, Titanium dioxide, Maccrogol/PEG 3000, Triacetin/Glycerol triacetate, Lactose monohydrate; Viên 2mg: Hypromellose 6 cP, Iron oxide red, Titanium dioxide, Macrogol/PEG 3000, Triacetin/Glycerol triacetate, Lactose monohydrate, FD&C BLUE#2, Iron oxide yellow
